DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine amount hepatic glucose production derive gluconeogenesis glycogenolysis post-absorptive state patient cystic fibrosis . II . Determine de novo lipogenesis relationship rest energy expenditure patient population .
DOC.brief_title: Study Hepatic Glucose Production De Novo Lipogenesis Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients undergo oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) blood drawn IV arm 6 time 3 hour . After first blood draw , patient receive beverage containing sugar write everything ate drink 24 hour study entry . Patients also undergo dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) scan 15 minute . Within 2 week OGTT , patient keep journal everything ate drink 3 day . Patients feed select meal follow even receive saline fluid IV overnight . During night , patient receive 2 dos oral doubly labeled water . The next morning , patient receive [ 1,2-13C ] acetate IV . A liquid mixed meal ( Ensure Plus ) ingest hourly throughout day . Patients also undergo hood indirect calorimetry 30 minute twice measure rest energy expenditure . All urine collect .
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Disease Characteristics Diagnosis cystic fibrosis OR Normal healthy volunteer ; endurancetrained athlete No colonization Burkholderia cepacia Prior/Concurrent Therapy Endocrine therapy : At least 2 month since prior oral IV corticosteroid ; lowdose inhaled corticosteroid allow Other : Shortacting insulin therapy allow ; least 24 hour since prior longacting insulin ( i.e. , neutral protamine Hagedorn , ultalente ) ; least 4 week since prior oral IV antibiotic ; hospital admission within past 6 week Patient Characteristics Hepatic : No elevation SGOT SGPT within past 3 month Other : Must medically stable ; diabetes mellitus allow ; weight stable within past 3 month ; pregnant ; prisoner
